entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero.
